sage.scene

Class TranslationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.Controller
      • sage.scene.TranslationController

  • public class TranslationController
extends Controller
    A SAGE scenenode controller that applies a cyclic translation to each node it controls. The translation value goes up to a maximum (specified via a constructor argument), then goes down the negative of that value, then repeats. The default translation step is 0.1; the default translation direction is along the X axis; the default maximum translation is 1.0 .
    Author:
    John Clevenger
